h1: How Many Calories in a Chipotle Tortilla?
assumptions: Standard Chipotle flour tortilla (~12-inch, 85g), plain, no fillings or toppings; based on Chipotle's nutritional data.

quick_answer.text: A standard Chipotle flour tortilla contains about 320 calories and 60g carbs.
